Errore otenende token de intrada OAuth.
translations.Integration of Forgejo software developm: Integratzione de su servìtziu de gestione de isvilupu de programa Forgejo
translations.Forgejo integration provides a dashboard:
S'integrazione de GitHub frunit unu trastu de su pannellu de controllu chi mustrat is notìficas tuas de importu
   e unu motore de chirca unificadu pro is magasinos, is sinnalatziones e is rechestas de pull.
translations.If you want to allow your Nextcloud user: Si cheres cunsentire a is utentes tuos de Nextcloud de impreare OAuth pro s'identificare in Forgejo, crea un'aplicatzione in is impostatziones de amministratzione de Forgejo e imposta s'ID e su segretu in fatu.
translations.Put the \"Application ID\" and \"Applica: Inserta is "ID aplicatzione" e su "segretu aplicatzione" in suta. I utentes Nextcloud ant a bìdere duncas unu butone "Connete a Forgejo" in is impostatzione personales si seletzionant s'istàntzia Forgejo definida inoghe.
translations.Client secret of your Forgejo applicatio: Segretu de su cliente de s'aplicatzione tua Forgejo
translations.Failed to save Forgejo admin options: No at fatu a sarvare is sèberos amministrativos de Forgejo
translations.Forgejo personal access token: Token de intrada personale de Forgejo
translations.Enable searching for repositories: Ativa sa chirca de is magasinos
translations.Warning, everything you type in the sear: Avisu: totu su chi iscries in s'istanca de chirca s'at a imbiare a GitHub.
translations.Successfully connected to Forgejo!: Connètidu a Forgejo in manera curreta!
translations.Failed to save Forgejo options: No at fatu a sarvare is sèberos de Forgejo
translations.Failed to get Forgejo notifications: No at fatu a retzire is notìficas de Forgejo
translations.You were directly addressed: T'ant indicadu a tie e totu
translations.Author: Autoria
translations.Failed to save Forgejo OAuth state: No at fatu a sarvare s'istadu OAuth de Forgejo
